name: Marine Rouge
overview: A young man named Kenji decides to have a vacation on the beautiful island together with his sister Hiromi. Taking a break from work and worries, the two discover a tourist resort with lovely beaches and high-class hotels. Very soon Kenji finds out that many attractive young women either work on the island or have come there for various reasons. Soon the holiday turns into a never-ending string of sexual escapades - and perhaps one of them will turn into a true romance? Marine Rouge is a Japanese-style adventure game. The player interacts with the environments by selecting commands, which include Look, Talk, Think, and Move. Object sub-menus appear very rarely; for the most part it is necessary to exhaust all possible choices to complete an event (usually a dialogue) and return to the limited freedom of choosing different locations to visit. Depending on these choices, the game will trigger different scenes, eventually shifting towards different endings.
